title: Back End Developer
description: Developed and integrated an e-commerce API with third-party services, including Shipper and Midtrans, using PHP and Laravel framework.
Created a reusable Laravel package to optimize notification feature development.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including frontend developers and product managers, to gather requirements and deliver high-quality features that enhance user experience and drive business growth.
Moderated monthly internal back-end development team sharing sessions, fostering knowledge exchanges to help each team member develop new skills and ideas.

title: External Coding Reviewer
description: Engaged as a part-time Code Reviewer, providing insightful feedback and constructive critiques on back-end developer coding assignments submitted by over 180 students.
Consistently received outstanding ratings, averaging 4.9 out of 5, reflecting the effectiveness of feedback and mentoring in fostering their growth as developers.

title: QA (Quality Assurance) Intern
description: Developed Quality Assurance (QA) and Testing training materials for future QA interns, which  improved the skill and productivity of the new QA team members.
Wrote comprehensive test cases for a new software product, which helped to find and fix several critical software bugs before release.
Composed streamlined project documentation and manual guideline after software testing process, which helped to improve the overall quality of the software product.
